sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-modal
    :title="title"
    :width="800"
    :visible="visible"
    :confirmLoading="confirmLoading"
    @ok="handleOk"
    @cancel="handleCancel"
    cancelText="关闭">
    
    <a-spin :spinning="confirmLoading">
      <a-form :form="form">
      
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="分类ID">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'catgoryid', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="一级分类ID">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'fistcatgory', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="二级分类ID">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'secondcatgory', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="标题">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入标题" v-decorator="['title', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="图标">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入图标" v-decorator="['icon', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="浏览量">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'viewcount', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="评论数">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'commentcount', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="类型1纯文字、2纯图片、3纯视频、4纯音频、5图文、6视频与图文、7音频与图文">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'contenttype', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="内容（纯文字/图文）">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入内容（纯文字/图文）" v-decorator="['content', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="图片（多张以；隔开）">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入图片（多张以；隔开）" v-decorator="['images', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="视频/音频地址">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入视频/音频地址" v-decorator="['videourl', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="视频/音频时长">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'videotime', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="视频第一针图片">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入视频第一针图片" v-decorator="['videoimage', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="发布时间">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入发布时间" v-decorator="['createtime', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="作者名">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入作者名" v-decorator="['authorname', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="作者ID">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'authorid', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="作者描述">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入作者描述" v-decorator="['author', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="1、免费；2、会员；3、付费">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'type', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="付费金额">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'price', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="是否推荐到分类">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'iscategoryrecomed', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="是否推荐到首页">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'isindexrecomend', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="直播间号">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'roomid', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="聊天室ID">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入聊天室ID" v-decorator="['groupid', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="点赞数">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'topcount', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="审核状态： 0审核中 1审核成功 2审核失败">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'status', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="拒绝原因">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入拒绝原因" v-decorator="['refusereason', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="是否删除 0否1是">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'del', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
		
      </a-form>
    </a-spin>
  </a-modal>
</template>

<script>
  import { httpAction } from '@/api/manage'
  import pick from 'lodash.pick'
  import moment from "moment"

  export default {
    name: "ProductModal",
    data () {
      return {
        title:"操作",
        visible: false,
        model: {},
        labelCol: {
          xs: { span: 24 },
          sm: { span: 5 },
        },
        wrapperCol: {
          xs: { span: 24 },
          sm: { span: 16 },
        },

        confirmLoading: false,
        form: this.$form.createForm(this),
        validatorRules:{
        },
        url: {
          add: "/product/product/add",
          edit: "/product/product/edit",
        },
      }
    },
    created () {
    },
    methods: {
      add () {
        this.edit({});
      },
      edit (record) {
        this.form.resetFields();
        this.model = Object.assign({}, record);
        this.visible = true;
        this.$nextTick(() => {
          this.form.setFieldsValue(pick(this.model,'catgoryid','fistcatgory','secondcatgory','title','icon','viewcount','commentcount','contenttype','content','images','videourl','videotime','videoimage','createtime','authorname','authorid','author','type','price','iscategoryrecomed','isindexrecomend','roomid','groupid','topcount','status','refusereason','del'))
		  //时间格式化
        });

      },
      close () {
        this.$emit('close');
        this.visible = false;
      },
      handleOk () {
        const that = this;
        // 触发表单验证
        this.form.validateFields((err, values) => {
          if (!err) {
            that.confirmLoading = true;
            let httpurl = '';
            let method = '';
            if(!this.model.id){
              httpurl+=this.url.add;
              method = 'post';
            }else{
              httpurl+=this.url.edit;
               method = 'put';
            }
            let formData = Object.assign(this.model, values);
            //时间格式化
            
            console.log(formData)
            httpAction(httpurl,formData,method).then((res)=>{
              if(res.success){
                that.$message.success(res.message);
                that.$emit('ok');
              }else{
                that.$message.warning(res.message);
              }
            }).finally(() => {
              that.confirmLoading = false;
              that.close();
            })



          }
        })
      },
      handleCancel () {
        this.close()
      },


    }
  }
</script>

<style lang="less" scoped>

</style>
